task_description: Create Project Overview Page - Progress ring, timeline, tabs (Linear BUI-68)

patterns.next_app_router: Next.js App Router with client components using 'use client' directive. Dynamic routes use [id] folder structure. Data fetching in useEffect with apiClient.get().
patterns.material_ui_components: Import MUI components individually (e.g., import Box from '@mui/material/Box'). Use sx prop for styling, styled() for complex custom components. Follow theme-based design.
patterns.api_client_pattern: Use apiClient from @/lib/api/client for all API calls. Handles auth tokens automatically via interceptors. Returns axios response with .data property.
patterns.loading_states: Show Skeleton components from MUI during data fetching. Use loading state variable with useState hook.
patterns.component_structure: TypeScript interfaces for all props. Export default function for pages, named exports for components. Use FC type for functional components.
patterns.fastapi_endpoints: Async route handlers with AsyncSession dependency. Use Depends(get_current_user) for auth. Return Pydantic response models.
patterns.existing_progress_component: CircularProgressDisplay component already exists in frontend/src/components/ui/ProgressBar.tsx with custom SVG circular progress implementation

existing_implementations.description: Found comprehensive dashboard page with KPI cards, data fetching patterns, and Material-UI components. CircularProgressDisplay component exists for progress rings. Tabs component with standard and segmented variants. Projects API with CRUD operations.
key_insights: Dashboard uses ProjectContext and AuthContext for shared state
CircularProgressDisplay component accepts value (0-100), size, thickness, color, and showLabel props
Tabs component has two variants: Tabs (standard) and SegmentedTabs (pill style) with TabPanel for content
Analytics API has endpoints for metrics, trends, and distributions - can serve as pattern for overview endpoint
Projects API uses UUID for project_id, has get_project endpoint with selectinload for members
Dashboard implements comprehensive loading states with Skeleton components
All text uses useTranslations() from next-intl for i18n support

design_reference.notes: Design file located and ready for reference during implementation

data_requirements.progress_ring: Project completion percentage (0-100) calculated from completed vs total tasks/items
data_requirements.timeline: List of project events with date, title, description, and type (milestone, activity, etc.)
data_requirements.tabs: Different sections of project overview (e.g., Summary, Statistics, Team, Documents)
